original_text: But he who comes against him shall do as he wills, and none shall stand before him. And he shall stand in the glorious land, with destruction in his hand.
korean_text: 오직 와서 치는 자가 자기 마음대로 행하리니 그를 당할 사람이 없겠고 그는 영화로운 땅에 설 것이요 그의 손에는 멸망이 있으리라

sentences.original_text: But he who comes against him
and none shall stand before him
sentences.korean_translation: 그 앞에 설 자가 없을 것이며

sentences.original_text: And he shall stand in the glorious land
